alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 24 at 3:31AM PST until November 24 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one quarter mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The morning commute along Oregon Highway 11 and Washington Highway 125 could become hazardous under freezing fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
